public static Integer saveToDB(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                               String table,
                               android.content.ContentValues values,
                               Integer id)
Saves entry to database. Updates row if entry with given id exists. Inserts new row otherwise

Parameters:
db - to store to
table - name of table
values - to be stored
id - of entry (if exists)
Returns:
stored entry id

loadCursorData

public static android.database.Cursor loadCursorData(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                     String tableName,
                                                     String selection,
                                                     String[] selectionArgs,
                                                     String[] projection,
                                                     String sortOrder)
Loads data from database and returns it as Cursor

Parameters:
db - where data is fetched
tableName - name of table
selection - The columns for the WHERE clause, =? for values
selectionArgs - The values for the WHERE clause
projection - String array of columns to return
sortOrder - SQL style SORT BY clause, without writing SORT BY
Returns:
Cursor having data of found rows
